name: Linear Simultaneous Equations
description: Simultaneous equations with 2 linear unknowns (x, y).

numberOfQuestions.label: Number of questions:
numberOfQuestions.help: Enter the number of questions you want to generate

low.help: Lowest possible answer (must be more than X)

high.help: Highest possible answer (must be less than X)

low.help: Lowest possible coefficient (must be more than X)

high.help: Highest possible coefficient (must be less than X)

name: Factorising Quadratic Equations
description: Quadratic expressions which can be factorised, with integer solutions for when the expression = zero.

numberOfQuestions.label: Number of questions:
numberOfQuestions.help: Enter the number of questions you want to generate

low.help: Lowest possible answer (must be more than X)

high.help: Highest possible answer (must be less than X)

low.help: Lowest possible coefficient (must be more than X)

high.help: Highest possible coefficient (must be less than X)

low.help: Lowest possible coefficient (must be more than X)

high.help: Highest possible coefficient (must be less than X)
